summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and to the Midway Landfill site; authorizing a Consent Decree with the Washington State Department of Ecology (Ecology) for remedial measures and for payment to Ecology; authorizing a City/Ecology grant agreement for design and construction of remedial actions and an amendment to a City/Ecology grant agreement for additional reimbursement; and accepting the grant funds for deposit in the Solid Waste Fund.
